resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104064</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104064</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206151</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Planet Protectors Club</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Planet Schutz-Verein</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Club de Protecteurs de Planète</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Clube Dos Protetores Do Planeta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Randello Delle Protezioni Del Pianeta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λέσχη προστατών πλανητών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Club De los Protectores Del Planeta</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">is a collection of games and puzzles that teach kids about solid waste disposal and its problems.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ist eine Ansammlung Spiele und Puzzlespiele, die 
Zicklein über Feststoffbeseitigung und seine Probleme unterrichten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">est une collection de jeux et les puzzles qui 
enseignent des gosses au sujet de disposition de déchets solides et 
de ses problèmes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">são uma coleção dos jogos e os enigmas que 
ensinem miúdos sobre a eliminação waste contínua e os seus 
problemas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">è una collezione di giochi ed i puzzle che 
insegnano i capretti circa eliminazione dei rifiuti solidi ed i 
relativi problemi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">είναι μια αποκομιδή των παιχνιδιών και των γρίφων που 
διδάσκουν τα κατσίκια για τη διάθεση στερεών αποβλήτων και τα 
προβλήματά του.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">es una colección de juegos y los rompecabezas que
enseñan a cabritos sobre la disposición inútil sólida y sus 
problemas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206151</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104064</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/planet-protectors-club</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
